title: [HOLD for payment 2024-07-10] [$250] Group – Long loading when leave the group as a last user and tap on back arrow
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to https://staging.new.expensify.com/
2. Log in
3. Create a group with another user
4. Send some messages
5. Click on the header
6. Remove all existing members from the group
7. Leave the group
8. When chat opens tap on the back arrow

Expected result: User leave the group successfully

Actual result: None
